permissions: Admins can delete efficiency incidents. Non-admins can delete only when authorized for the incident subject (same as create permission).
side_effects: Deletes the efficiency incident; destroys dependent records (incident headline suggestions, incident unit-of-measure quantities, root causes, action items, incident participants, incident tag incidents) and removes related notifications; child incidents are retained with parent cleared.
validation_notes: An efficiency incident ID argument is required. --confirm is required to delete an efficiency incident.
